title: Add or remove changes
content:
NoteÂ Only a user with the appropriate permissions may add or remove changes for a locked change list.

In a release, you can add or remove changes in the following ways:

In Release Management

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Release.
  2. The Releases page lists all releases arranged in column format.
  3. Select the release you want to work on.
  4. Click .
  5. Select the Included changes tab.
    1. To add a change to the release:
      1. Click Add or the grid icon .
      2. Select the change(s). The added items appear in yellow.
      3. Click Save.
    2. To remove a change from the release:
      1. Select the change(s).
      2. Click Remove. The selected items appear in strikethrough text.
      3. Click Save.

In Change Calendar release mode

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Release.
  2. The Releases page lists all releases arranged in column format.
  3. Select the release you want to work on.
  4. Click .
  5. Click .
  6. Click Add Changes to release.
  7. Select the changes from the list.
  8. Click Add to release.

In the Change Management list view - for multiple changes

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Change.
  2. The Changes page lists all changes arranged in column format.
  3. Select the changes you want to work on.
  4. In the Preview Pane, select Release.
  5. Select a release to add the change to a release.
  6. Click Update.

In the Change Management Preview Pane

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Change.
  2. The Changes page lists all changes arranged in column format.
  3. Select the change you want to work on.
  4. In the Preview Pane, click Edit.
  5. Click Release.
    1. Select a release to add the change to a release.
    2. Clear the field to remove the change from a release.
  6. Click Save.

In a Change Management record

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Change.
  2. The Changes page lists all changes arranged in column format.
  3. Select the change you want to work on.
  4. Click .
  5. In the General tab, select Classification.
  6. Edit Release to add the change to a release, or remove it from a release.
  7. Click Save.

Related topics

  • How to create a release record
  • How to edit a release record
  • Releases and the Change Calendar
